name: encrypted-network-access-token
description: Staking-based non-tradable access token smart contract for encrypted data networks

scripts.deploy:localnet: solana config set --url http://localhost:8899 && solana program deploy target/deploy/encrypted_network_access_token.so
scripts.deploy:devnet: solana config set --url devnet && solana program deploy target/deploy/encrypted_network_access_token.so

author: Encrypto Team
